snippet: A man veered his car onto the sidewalk at the campus, leaped out, and stabbed several people with a butcher knife, law enforcement officials said....
lead_paragraph: A man veered his car onto the sidewalk at the campus, leaped out, and stabbed several people with a butcher knife, law enforcement officials said.
abstract: Authorities say Ohio State student Abdul Artan was fatally shot by university Police Officer Alan Horujko after he rammed his car into pedestrians and started attacking passers-by with butcher knife; attack leaves 11 students, faculty and staff members injured; investigators are working to determine whether attack was act of terrorism.

headline.main: Suspect Is Killed in Attack at Ohio State University That Injured 11
headline.print_headline: 11 Are Injured in a Rampage at Ohio State

byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Travis Hoewischer, Alan Blinder, Jess Bidgood, Camilla Schick, Michael Huson, Rukmini Callimachi and Julia Preston.
byline.original: By MITCH SMITH, RICHARD PÉREZ-PEÑA and ADAM GOLDMAN
